span.a:
School District of Spring Valley Overview Video
"Get to know us"

span.br: ("The Regular Open Enrollment Application period for the 2020-2021 school year will open at midnight on Monday, February 3, 2020 and close on April 30th, 2020 at 4:00 pm. Nonresident students who were open enrolled at Spring Valley during the 2019-20 school year

span.style: text-align: center; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: to reapply for the 2020-21 school year. If you wish to enroll your child for the 2019-2020 school year, use the Alternative Open Enrollment Application procedures. Links to those procedures and application are provided below.)

p.span: It is the intent of the Spring Valley Public School District that the information on its website be accessible to individuals with disabilities in complance with the requirements of Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, and Title ll of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990 along with accompanying statutory regulations.

If you are having difficulty accessing information on our website due to a disability, please contact us the webmaster and provide the URL (web address) of the material you tried to access, the problem you experienced, and your contact information, including name, email address and phone number so that we may accommodate your needs.
